BattleCommands.Ability

    Package Description
    BattleCommands  
    Heros  

    • Uses of Ability in BattleCommands

      Subclasses of Ability in BattleCommands 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AssassinAbility
      Contains many inner classes of assassin type abilities.
      static class  AssassinAbility.ExposeWeakness
      ExposeWeakness class is an OffensiveAbility that implements the StatusEffectAbility interface.
      static class  AssassinAbility.PoisonBlade
      PoisonBlade class is an OffensiveAbility that implements the StatusEffectAbility interface.
      static class  AssassinAbility.ThrowKnives
      ThrowKnives class is an OffensiveAbility.
      class  BaseAttack
      BaseAttack OffensiveAbility.
      class  DefensiveAbility
      DefensiveAbility is an abstract class that extends Ability.
      static class  MageAbility.Blizzard
      Blizzard class is an OffensiveAbility.
      static class  MageAbility.FireBall
      FireBall class is an OffensiveAbility.
      static class  MageAbility.Lightning
      Lightning class is an OffensiveAbility.
      class  OffensiveAbility
      OffensiveAbility is am abstract class that extends Ability.
      static class  PaladinAbility.Defend
      Defend class is an DefensiveAbility that implements the StatusEffectAbility interface.
      static class  PaladinAbility.Heal
      Heal class is a DefensiveAbility that heals the current acting hero.
      static class  PaladinAbility.HolySmite
      HolySmite class is an OffensiveAbility.
      class  SoldierAbility
      Contains many inner classes of Soldier type abilities.
      static class  SoldierAbility.Defend
      Defend class is an DefensiveAbility that implements the StatusEffectAbility interface.
      static class  SoldierAbility.HamString
      HamString class is an OffensiveAbility.
      static class  SoldierAbility.Lunge
      Lunge class is an OffensiveAbility.
      static class  SoldierAbility.MultiShot
      MultiShot class is an OffensiveAbility.
      static class  SoldierAbility.PoisonShot
      PoisonShot class is an OffensiveAbility that implements the StatusEffectAbility interface.
      static class  SoldierAbility.ShieldBash
      SheildBash class is an OffensiveAbility that implements the StatusEffectAbility and CrowdControlAbility interfaces.
      static class  SoldierAbility.Snipe
      Snipe class is an OffensiveAbility.
      Methods in BattleCommands that return Ability 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Ability Ability.getAbility(Hero hero)
      Returns the hero's ability from the hero's ability set using the ability instance.
      static Ability Ability.getAbility(Hero hero, java.lang.String ability)
      Returns the hero's ability from the hero's ability set by it's key.

    • Uses of Ability in Heros

      Methods in Heros that return types with arguments of type Ability 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Ability> Hero.getAbilities()
      Generic method which returns the current hero's ability HashMap but allows them to be seen as BattleCommands as input to other methods if necessary.
      Methods in Heros with parameters of type Ability 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Hero.checkIfEnoughAP(Ability ability)
      Hero checks if it has enough ability points to perform an action.

      Set this hero's abilities, used to insure they only receive SoldierAbilities.

      Set this hero's abilities, used to insure they only receive SoldierAbilities.

      Set this hero's abilities, used to insure they only receive SoldierAbilities.
      void Paladin.setAbilityCheckType(Ability ability)
      Set this hero's abilities, used to insure they only receive PaladinAbilities.

      abstract void Hero.setAbilityCheckType(Ability ab)
      Method to confirm a Hero's ability belong to that Hero's subclass.
      void Assassin.setAbilityCheckType(Ability ability)
